languages.text: {n}Дознаватель переводит взгляд с бесчувственной девушки на Теобальда.{/n} "Полагаю, Дитя дорого Дому Навис Нобилите по иным причинам, нежели чем неконтролируемые изливы варп-колдовства. Интересно, по каким же? Молодой, неокрепший, наверняка не закончивший свое обучение навигатор..."

{n}The Interrogator looks from the unconscious Cassia to Theobald.{/n} "I presume this Navis Nobilite House has reasons for treasuring the Child other than uncontrolled outbursts of warp sorcery. What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель переводит взгляд с бесчувственной девушки на Теобальда.{/n} "Полагаю, Дитя дорого Дому Навис Нобилите по иным причинам, нежели чем неконтролируемые изливы варп-колдовства. Интересно, по каким же? Молодой, неокрепший, наверняка не закончивший свое обучение навигатор..."

Which might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

{n}The Interrogator looks from the unconscious Cassia to Theobald.{/n} "I presume this Navis Nobilite House has reasons for treasuring the Child other than uncontrolled outbursts of warp sorcery. What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator lässt seinen Blick von der bewusstlosen Cassia zu Theobald schweifen.{/n} "Ich nehme an, dieses Haus der Navis Nobilite hat andere Gründe, dieses Kind zu hüten, als unkontrollierte Ausbrüche von Warp-Magie. Wie könnten sie wohl lauten, frage ich mich. Eine junge, unreife Navigatorin, die ihre Ausbildung wahrscheinlich noch nicht abgeschlossen hat ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks from the unconscious Cassia to Theobald.{/n} "I presume this Navis Nobilite House has reasons for treasuring the Child other than uncontrolled outbursts of warp sorcery. What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator lässt seinen Blick von der bewusstlosen Cassia zu Theobald schweifen.{/n} "Ich nehme an, dieses Haus der Navis Nobilite hat andere Gründe, dieses Kind zu hüten, als unkontrollierte Ausbrüche von Warp-Magie. Wie könnten sie wohl lauten, frage ich mich. Eine junge, unreife Navigatorin, die ihre Ausbildung wahrscheinlich noch nicht abgeschlossen hat ..."

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur regarde le corps inconscient de Cassia, puis Théobald.{/n} « Si cette maison de la Navis Nobilite protège aussi précieusement l'Enfant, j'imagine que ce n'est pas uniquement pour ses accès de sorcellerie du Warp incontrôlés. Je me demande quelles sont ses raisons... Une jeune navigatrice inexpérimentée, qui n'a sans doute même pas encore terminé sa formation... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks from the unconscious Cassia to Theobald.{/n} "I presume this Navis Nobilite House has reasons for treasuring the Child other than uncontrolled outbursts of warp sorcery. What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur regarde le corps inconscient de Cassia, puis Théobald.{/n} « Si cette maison de la Navis Nobilite protège aussi précieusement l'Enfant, j'imagine que ce n'est pas uniquement pour ses accès de sorcellerie du Warp incontrôlés. Je me demande quelles sont ses raisons... Une jeune navigatrice inexpérimentée, qui n'a sans doute même pas encore terminé sa formation... »

languages.text: {n}海因里希的目光从昏迷不醒的卡西娅转到了西奥巴德身上。{/n}“我猜，导航宗族之所以如此珍视这个孩子，并不仅仅由于她不受控制的亚空间之力，肯定还有其他原因。这不禁让我很是好奇，这会是因为什么呢？明明只是个年轻、不成熟的导航者，可能连训练都没有完成——”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks from the unconscious Cassia to Theobald.{/n} "I presume this Navis Nobilite House has reasons for treasuring the Child other than uncontrolled outbursts of warp sorcery. What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的目光从昏迷不醒的卡西娅转到了西奥巴德身上。{/n}“我猜，导航宗族之所以如此珍视这个孩子，并不仅仅由于她不受控制的亚空间之力，肯定还有其他原因。这不禁让我很是好奇，这会是因为什么呢？明明只是个年轻、不成熟的导航者，可能连训练都没有完成——”

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは意識のないカシアからテオバルドに視線を移す。{/n}「この航宙貴族家には、制御不能な<歪み>の魔術の爆発以外にも、御子を大切にする理由があるのだろう。だが、いったい何だろうな？まだ訓練も終えていない、若く、未熟な航宙士…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks from the unconscious Cassia to Theobald.{/n} "I presume this Navis Nobilite House has reasons for treasuring the Child other than uncontrolled outbursts of warp sorcery. What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは意識のないカシアからテオバルドに視線を移す。{/n}「この航宙貴族家には、制御不能な<歪み>の魔術の爆発以外にも、御子を大切にする理由があるのだろう。だが、いったい何だろうな？まだ訓練も終えていない、若く、未熟な航宙士ーー」

languages.text: {n}El interrogador observa a la inconsciente Cassia y luego a Theobald.{/n} «Supongo que la casa Navis Nobilite tiene razones para proteger a la Niña que van más allá de simples ataques incontrolados de magia disforme. Me pregunto cuáles serán... Una navegante joven e inmadura que lo más probable es que todavía no haya terminado su entrenamiento...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks from the unconscious Cassia to Theobald.{/n} "I presume this Navis Nobilite House has reasons for treasuring the Child other than uncontrolled outbursts of warp sorcery. What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador observa a la inconsciente Cassia y luego a Theobald.{/n} «Supongo que la casa Navis Nobilite tiene otras razones para proteger a la Niña que simples ataques incontrolados de magia disforme. Me pregunto cuáles serán... Una navegante joven e inmadura que lo más probable es que todavía no haya terminado su entrenamiento...».

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, bakışlarını bilinçsiz Cassia'dan Theobald'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Bu Navis Nobilite Hanesi'nin Çocuk'a bu kadar değer vermesinde, kontrol dışı öteboyut sahirliği faaliyetleri haricinde sebepler de olsa gerek. Acaba nelerdir? Genç, olgunlaşmamış, muhtemelen henüz eğitimini de tamamlamamış bir Rotacı..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks from the unconscious Cassia to Theobald.{/n} "I presume this Navis Nobilite House has reasons for treasuring the Child other than uncontrolled outbursts of warp sorcery. What might those be, I wonder? A young, immature Navigator who likely hasn't yet completed her training—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, bakışlarını bilinçsiz Cassia'dan Theobald'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Bu Navis Nobilite Hanesi'nin Çocuk'a bu kadar değer vermesinde, kontrol dışı öteboyut sahirliği faaliyetleri haricinde sebepler de olsa gerek. Acaba nelerdir? Genç, olgunlaşmamış, muhtemelen henüz eğitimini de tamamlamamış bir Rotacı..."
